As a follow up to my post about the past council I would like to also 
point out another rule that Kyle broke. In the RPG rules charter it 
blatantly states that there will be no offensive drones(group 
Charachters) except for those used for Construction and repairs. the 
Two drones used in Kyles post violate that rule, thus another reason 
why I believe we should have a temp council for the RPG. One that 
would exist until one(Im not sure if Megan is alive. heh)or two come 
back. Of course once one member is back they'll have all say so it 
would be up to them if the temp council stayed and helped until all 
four members have returned. But thats just my two cents.
